This settlement cannot be occupied by your faction.

Each unit Troll type (Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, River Trolls, Stone Trolls, Bile Trolls, Chaos Trolls) in all armies contributes Trollkind points. The troll units in Throggâ€™s army are multiplying by double the Trollkind points.
Troll Trollkind points can be spent to build special structures in Minor and Major settlements, and to perform the Troll Call.
